recipesJson.name: Nebula
recipesJson.author: matthewkocanda
recipesJson.description: A refreshing mix of strawberry and pineapple with some stone fruit accents. Add your preferred strength of Koolada to turn this recipe into a perfect summertime vape.

reviews.text: I thought this was good the first couple of days. The apple dominates the mix making it enjoyable. After a few days it seems to turn to mud though. Everything sort of blends together and the strawberries fade. I'd mix it again. Just in smaller batches that I can vape in a day or two.
This is very tasty. I don't get much strawberry, peach or pineapple though. Just a very sweet juicy apple with a hint of dragonfruit on the exhale. Thanks for sharing!
